definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Some photos were of beauty queens in evening gowns or other high-status clothing.
sentences.chinese: 有些照片是身着晚礼服或者其他显贵衣服的选美皇后。

sentences.english: How long does it take to make an evening dress?
If you are looking to save money on the catering than why not host a BBQ on the Evening Dresses.
sentences.chinese: 想在婚礼上省钱，为何不穿晚礼服举办一场BBQ。

sentences.english: The library was full of English newspapers, and the waiters wore tuxedos.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆里有很多英文报纸，侍者穿着晚礼服。

sentences.english: Decorous evening dress, healthy bull- puncher is installed.
sentences.chinese: 高雅的晚礼服，健康的牛仔装。

sentences.english: All those little bones you have to dismantle, everybody dressed up fortheir dissection.
sentences.chinese: 它们的骨头又多又小，你还得穿着晚礼服跟它较劲。

sentences.english: The rhinestones on her long dress are sparkling.
sentences.chinese: 在她晚礼服上的宝石闪闪发亮。

sentences.english: She saw an evening gown made of silk there last month which she wanted to buy very much.
sentences.chinese: 她上个月在那里看了一件绛质的晚礼服，她很想买。

sentences.english: Hepburns wears an evening gown in 1961.
Search through bridal magazines for some ideas on a Evening Dresses.
sentences.chinese: 翻翻新婚杂志找些点子怎么穿晚礼服。

sentences.english: The men are handsome in their black ties and their cummerbunds, the women beautiful in their evening gowns.
sentences.chinese: 女人著晚礼服楚楚有致，男人黑领带宽腰带风度翩翩。

sentences.english: We have a long waiting list for the evening items from Balmain.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个长长的等候购买巴尔曼晚礼服的名单。

sentences.english: My first move was to get the old tuxedo out of mothballs.
sentences.chinese: 我第一步是拿出那件老式晚礼服里的樟脑球。

sentences.english: All female guests have to wear evening dress to the party.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴，女宾一律要穿晚礼服。

sentences.english: As a result, we have a long wating list for evening pieces from this particular label.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有很多人都在等待购买这个牌子的晚礼服。

sentences.english: Everyone is very happy and in evening dress.
sentences.chinese: 每一个人都很开心，都穿着晚礼服。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
